All Classes

  • Class Description
    AcceptedSetupBuilder
    The server sends to the client that the builders setup positions are correct
    Apollo
    Class Apollo your Builder may move into an opponent Builder's space by forcing their Builder to the space yours just vacated
    Ares
    Class Ares you may remove an unoccupied block (not dome) neighboring your unmoved Worker
    Artemis
    Class Artemis your Builder may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space
    AskBuilderChosen
    The server asks the client the builder to use for an action at the beginning of the turn
    AskCell
    The server asks the client the cell to use for an action after he has selected a builder
    AskCellError
    The server re-asks the client the builder to use for an action at the beginning of the turn because the first cell he has selceted wasn't usable for the game rules
    AskNumPlayers
    The server asks the first client connected in the lobby, the number of players for the match
    AskPositionBuilders
    The server asks the client the builders setup positions, before the game starts
    AskUsePower
    The server asks the client if he wants to use the power of his GodCard
    AskUsername
    The server asks the client his username
    Athena
    Class Athena if one of your Builders moved up on your last turn, opponent Builders cannot move up this turn
    Atlas
    Class Atlas your Builder may build a dome at any level
    Board
    This class represents the Board used to play the game.
    BoardController
    This class represents the controller for the client's board
    Builder
    This class implements Builder, that is the pawn which moves on the Board.
    BuilderColor
    This class contains the possible colors that can identify a player
    C2S
    Class C2S absract class for message from client to server
    Cell
    This class implements cell.
    Client
    Class Client client connection with server using socket
    ClientHandler
    Class ClientHandler server launches a thread for each client to listen and to send messages
    CloseConnection
    Message sent to the server from the client, to notify the closed connection
    ConnectionController
    This class represents the controller for the connection window
    Deck
    Class Deck describes a generic deck(an arraylist of God cards)
    Demeter
    Class Demeter your Builder may build one additional time, but not on the same space
    ErrorUsername
    The server tells the client that his username can't be used (already taken)
    GameController
    Controller for the server, it takes place between the model and the network in the server side
    GodCard
    Class GodCard describes a generic turn without power
    GodCardsParser
    Class GodCardsParser that creates a deck of cards from a json file(is the most scalable choice)
    GUI
    This class represents the initial stage (StartStage.fxml) that is shown to the client display.
    GUIController
    This class is used for the interaction between GUI and the message parser of the client.
    Hephaestus
    Class Hephaestus your Builder may build one additional block(not dome) on top of your first block
    Hestia
    Class Hestia your worker may build on additional time, but this cannot be on a perimeter space
    Lobby
    Lobby includes the clients waiting for the beginning of the match
    LobbyController
    this class is the controller of the lobby's window
    LostController
    this class is used to manage the lost's window
    LostForConnectionStageController
    This class is used to manage the lost for disconnection
    LostForDisconnection
    The server notifies the client that he has lost for the disconnection of another player (all clients lose)
    MainClient
    Main Client
    MatchState
    This class is used to describe the state of the current game.
    MessageClient
    Message that will be sent from the client to the server
    MessageInterfaceClient
    Visitor Pattern
    MessageInterfaceServer
    Visitor pattern
    MessageParserClient
    Visitor pattern For each received message, here are described the actions that the client has to do
    MessageParserServer
    Visitor pattern For each received message, here are described the actions that the server has to do
    MessageServer
    Message that will be sent from the server to the client
    MessageVisitorClient
    Visitor pattern 1 method for each message that the client can receive
    MessageVisitorServer
    Visitor pattern 1 method for each message that the server can receive
    Minotaur
    Class Minotaur your Builder may move into an opponent Builder's space, if their Builder can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level
    ModifyUsernameController
    This class manages the username modify window
    NPlayersController
    this class is used to manage and display window associated to the n players choice
    OpenLobby
    The server notifies the client that he is inserted in the lobby
    Pan
    Class Pan you also win if your Builder moves down two or more levels
    Player
    Class Player describes a generic player that play on the board.
    Poseidon  
    Position
    This class implements position, that is the couple of coordinates of the cell in the board matrix
    Prometheus
    Class Prometheus if your Builder does not move up, it may build both before and after moving
    S2C
    Class S2C absract class for message from server to client
    SendBeginTurn
    The server notifies the client that it's his turn
    SendBoardLoaded
    Message sent to the server from the client to notify that the board (GUI) has succesfully loaded on the screen and it's ready to accept commands
    SendBuilderChosen
    The client sends to the server the builder that the user has selected on the GUI for the moves
    SendBuilderPositions
    The client sends to the server the setup position of the builders before the game starts (Two of this messages will be sent, once for each builder)
    SendCardToPlayers
    The server sends to the client the GodCard randomly assigned to him
    SendCellChosen
    The client sends to the server the cell chosen from the user on the GUI for a move or a build action
    SendCellWithPower
    The client sends to the server the cell chosen from the user on the GUI for a move or a build action adding the confirm that the user wants to use the power of the GodCard assigned to him
    SendEndTurn
    The server notifies the client that his turn is finished
    SendGameStart
    The server notifies the client that the game is starting
    SendHasLost
    The server notifies the client that he has lost
    SendHasWon
    The server notifies the client that he has won
    SendNumPlayers
    The first client connected to the match in the lobby sends to the server the numbers of the players for the match
    SendOpponents
    The server sends to the client his opponents in the match, and their GodCards
    SendPowerMessage
    The server asks the client if he wants to use the power of his GodCard
    SendPowerNotUsed
    The client sends to the server the cell chosen from the user on the GUI for a move or a build action adding the confirm that the user doesn't want to use the power of the GodCard assigned to him
    SendUpdatedBoard
    The server updates the clients of the changes on the board, after every action
    SendUsername
    The client sends to the server his username
    Server
    Class Server server listens for requests
    ServerClosedController
    This class is used to manage the fall of the server
    StartGameController
    This class is used to control the start game window
    Triton
    Class Triton Each time your Worker moves into a perimeter space, it may immediately move again
    WinController
    this class displays and manages the window connected to the win
    Zeus
    Class Zeus your worker may build a block under itself
